short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily bookmark webpages to your Anchr collection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anchr provides you with kind of a toolbox for tiny tasks on the internet. Currently you can upload and share pictures, shorten links for easier sharing and creating link collections, which are like a bookmark list that is accessible from everywhere.
With this extension you can directly interact with Anchr.io without even visting the website what makes shortening or bookmarking a link even faster.
